org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Error-DuplicateARTStartDate
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Patients with more than one ART Start Date
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select obs.person_id, pid1.identifier as PepfarID, pid2.identifier as HospID, count(obs.concept_id) as TotalEntries from obs LEFT join patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) LEFT join patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid2.identifier_type=5 and pid2.voided=0) where obs.concept_id=159599 and obs.voided=0 and obs.obs_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate GROUP BY obs.person_id,obs.concept_id HAVING count(obs.concept_id)>1;
